english_example_sentence: If you had waited for that important news more carefully in the morning.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты ждал эту важную новость утром более внимательно.
turkish_example_sentence: Sen, o önemli haberi sabah daha dikkatli bekleseydin.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen, o önemli haberi sabah daha dikkatli ______.
